CustomField.formula:
IF( $Setup.summit__Summit_Events_Settings__c.summit__Managed_Package__c,
summit__Community_Base_URL__c + 'services/apexrest/summit/summiteventsfeed?eventId=' + Id + '&feedType=eventList&viewStart=' + TEXT(YEAR( summit__Start_Date__c)) + '-' + TEXT(MONTH( summit__Start_Date__c)) + '-' + TEXT(DAY(summit__Start_Date__c))+ '+00:00:00' + '&viewEnd=' + TEXT(YEAR( summit__End_Date__c)) + '-' + TEXT(MONTH( summit__End_Date__c)) + '-' + TEXT(DAY(summit__End_Date__c)) + '+24:59:59',
summit__Community_Base_URL__c + 'services/apexrest/summiteventsfeed?eventId=' + Id + '&feedType=eventList&viewStart=' + TEXT(YEAR( summit__Start_Date__c)) + '-' + TEXT(MONTH( summit__Start_Date__c)) + '-' + TEXT(DAY(summit__Start_Date__c))+ '+00:00:00' + '&viewEnd=' + TEXT(YEAR( summit__End_Date__c)) + '-' + TEXT(MONTH( summit__End_Date__c)) + '-' + TEXT(DAY(summit__End_Date__c)) + '+24:59:59' )
CustomField.label: Event Instance Feed URL
